product_name: WTB Wolverine TCS Bike Tire - 27.5 x 2.2
long_description: A tubeless-compatible tire for 27.5 in. wheels, the WTB Wolverine TCS confidently tackles dicey descents, flies across flats and devours steep climbs during any cross-country session. Features a fast-rolling, moderately spaced tread pattern, plentiful working edges that cling to hardpack and outside knobs that let you shred corners. Super Track DNA rubber compound is a high-traction, sticky rubber offering solid traction and control in steep, loose conditions. Aramid bead offers great bead-seat characteristics and low weight.
short_description: A tubeless-compatible tire for 27.5 in. wheels, the WTB Wolverine TCS confidently tackles dicey descents, flies across flats and devours steep climbs during any cross-country session.
